sentence: I'm glad Florida Governor Ron DeSantis is standing for what's right, and I hope Christians will continue to pray for the governor and support him."
author: Sarah Taylor
title: Rev. Franklin Graham condemns Disney as being 'in the gutter' during blistering rant: A 'moral failure'
